alert.note: Alert for Gates; Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:57PM EDT until June 12 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hertford County in northeastern North Carolina... Gates County in northeastern North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 657 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winton, or 7 miles east of Murfreesboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Harrellsville and Roduco around 715 PM EDT. Gatesville and Gates around 720 PM EDT. Sunbury and Hobbsville around 735 PM EDT. Corapeake around 740 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tunis, Eure, Easons Crossroads, Savage, Acorn Hill, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Mapleton, Hazelton and Buckland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
